name: Legend Of Zelda Tumblr Post Icons
description: Dashboard post icons for Tumblr. Inspired by the Zelda series.
additional_info: These are some Legend of Zelda post icons that I made for a tumblr dashboard. It works best on Google Chrome. If you like em' and would like to request icons or anything else, request them at http://dancingtocaralarms.tumblr.com
